main event: A military project recorded a sighting of a round object, the size of a basketball, shining silvery and observed at a very high altitude in Oak Ridge, Tennessee.
interesting points: The sighting was documented on June 15, 1958., The object was described as round and shined like silver., The conclusion suggested it could possibly be an aircraft at high altitude., A watchman in Oak Ridge witnessed the object disappear from sight after being observed for about 3 minutes., Wind directions were requested from the U.S. Weather Bureau for further analysis.
witness description: M/Sgt. A. J. Chaille, United States Air Force, Headquarters, 7th Tactical Control Squadron
